description: This header file defines a class WECB which inherits from various interfaces, including RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer<WECB>. It sets up RPC method bindings related to WECB parameters handling, such as getting and setting parameters, attributes, session IDs, and managing objects. The file also declares functions for initialization, cleanup, and pre/post test prerequisites.

classes.name: WECB
classes.description: A class providing an interface for WECB parameter management via RPC calls. It includes methods for initialization, cleanup, and RPC command handling for getting and setting parameters, attributes, session IDs, and object management.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the WECB interface with a version string.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Performs cleanup for the WECB interface with a version string.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Checks pre-requisites before running test modules.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Checks post-requisites after running test modules.

methods.name: WECB_GetParamNames
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to get parameter names.

methods.name: WECB_GetParamValues
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to get parameter values.

methods.name: WECB_GetParamAttributes
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to get parameter attributes.

methods.name: WECB_SetParamValues
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to set parameter values.

methods.name: WECB_SetParamAttribute
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to set a parameter's attribute.

methods.name: WECB_SetSessionId
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to set session ID.

methods.name: WECB_AddObject
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to add an object.

methods.name: WECB_DelObject
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to delete an object.

methods.name: WECB_SetCommit
methods.description: Handles the RPC call to set commit.
